author: The Editorial Board
title: Lessons of a Bipartisan Budget Blowout
text:
Congress passed a budget deal on Friday morning after some melodrama during the night, and if only the American public were allowed to sleep through the manufactured outrage of every government shutdown. The domestic spending blowout is lamentable for the GOP, which will at some point have to reform the greasers of bigger government, not least the budget process.
The House passed the $300 billion bipartisan deal 240-186 in a victory for Speaker Paul Ryan, who managed to hold together the majority of his conference, even as...
